text: Ian Richards may refer to: * Ian Richards (admiral) (born 1930), Royal Australian Navy officer, Deputy Chief of Naval Staff 1983–84 Included in accordance with MOS:DABRED * Ian Richards (racewalker) (born 1948), English race walker * Ian Richards (cricketer) (born 1957), English cricketer * Ian Richards (judge) (born 1975), American judge * Ian Richards (footballer) (born 1979), English footballer * Ian Richards (diplomat) British diplomat ==References==
title: Ian Richards
